patterns: What can you tell me about Acropolis
What do you know about Acropolis
What can you tell me about Acropolis Institute
What do you know about this Institute
Tell me more about Acropolis College
responses: Acropolis Institute of Technology and Research (AITR) is a private engineering institution which is situated in Indore in Madhya Pradesh. It was established in the year 2005. It has a campus that is equipped with all essential requisites needed to feature a conducive learning environment. It offers an undergraduate and postgraduate degree in engineering and a master level degree in computing and management.

patterns: Give me some details about Acropolis
Give me some details about Acropolis Institute
What are some details about Acropolis
responses: For BTech, Diploma, BE, ME, BPharm and MPharm courses, this institution is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya (RGPV). Also, it is affiliated to Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya (DAVV) for BCA, BBA, BCom, BSc, BA, Master of Computer Application (MCA) and Master of Business Administration (MBA) courses.The institution has different admission criteria for different courses. For the candidates planning to take admission in the BE course, it is important to appear in the Online off-campus Counselling. Students seeking admission in MTech courses must have passed AICTE approved BE/ BTech or equivalent examination with a minimum of 55 per cent aggregate marks.

patterns: Give me some information about CDC
responses: Career Development Cell of the institution aims to prepare students to find better employment opportunities. Several activities and programmes are organised by the cell to help students refine their skills, improve their communication, prepare job applications and face personal interviews. Also, these activities give students an insight into the corporate world and its requirements. Numerous students are selected by the companies based on academic performance and skill set. Some of the recruiters that offered placements are TCS, Infosys, Persistent System, Zensar, Infogain.

Several scholarships are offered by Acropolis Institute of Technology and Research to help students fulfil their career goals. From time to time, various scholarship schemes of Universities, Government and private institutions are offered too at the institution. The eligibility criteria to avail of these scholarships likely change over time, therefore, students are advised to stay updated with details of scholarships offered along with the criteria needed to avail them.

patterns: What are different cell in college
responses: The different cells or clubs in our institution are : Cyber Security Cell, IEEE SB(EC), AITR-ACM(Association for Computer Machinery), DSAC-AITR(Data Science and Analytics Club), Acrotronics Club, GDSC AITR(Google Developer Student Clubs), Yavnika Hobby Club, Women Cell, Entrepreneurship Development Cell, Alumni Cell.

responses: The different departments or branches in our institution are : Computer Science and Engineering (CSE), Information Technology (IT), Computer Science and Information Technology (CSIT), Civil Engineering (CE), Mechanical Engineering (ME) and Electronics and Communication (EC).

Admission for B.Tech in acropolis institute of technology and research

tell me about the admission criteria for B.Tech in acropolis institute of technology and research
tell me about the admission criteria
responses: Candidates interested in seeking admission in 4-year full time B.Tech. course should have passed 12th or equivalent from any recognized board or university with Mathematics as compulsory subject and minimum aggregate 45% marks in PCM collectively. Candidates having JEE score cards will get the preference.Admission to the B.Tech. course is as per the guidelines laid down by the Government.For more details, please visit the link: https://aitr.ac.in/courses-procedure/

patterns: Admission for MBA in acropolis institute
Admission for MBA in acropolis institute of technology and research

tell me about the admission criteria for MBA in acropolis
tell me about the admission criteria for MBA in acropolis institute
tell me about the admission criteria for MBA in acropolis institute of technology and research
tell me about the admission criteria for MBA
responses: Bachelor's Degree in any discipline of minimum 3 years duration from a recognized University with 50% marks( for General) and 45% (for reserved) categories and appeared in entrance examination- C-MAT .Admission to MBA courses is conducted through a counselling process based on C-MAT score. If seats are vacant after C-MAT based counselling process, second round of counselling based on the qualifying exam is conducted and at last college level counselling can be conducted as per the rules. Admission in MBA would be done through DTE.For more details, please visit the link: https://aitr.ac.in/courses-procedure/

patterns: Admission for MCA in acropolis institute
Admission for MCA in acropolis institute of technology and research
Admission for MCA in acropolis institute of technology and research
tell me about the admission criteria for MBA
tell me about the admission criteria for MCA in acropolis
tell me about the admission criteria for MCA in acropolis institute
tell me about the admission criteria for MCA in acropolis institute of technology and research
tell me about the admission criteria for MCA
responses: A candidate seeking admission to MCA Course should be a Graduate with at least 50% marks and 45% marks in case of SC, ST, OBC (excluding Creamy Layer) category of Madhya Pradesh in aggregate of any UGC/AICTE approved Indian University or from a foreign University recognized by Association of Indian Universities (AIU) or institute recognized by the concerned University as equivalent thereto. Recognized Bachelor's degree of minimum 3 Yrs duration with Mathematics at (10+2) level or at Graduate level.A candidate seeking admission to 5 Years Integrated MCA Course (MCA) should be Passed 10+2 examination with Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects along with one of the Chemistry / Biotechnology / Biology /Technical Vocational subjects with at least 45% marks and 40% marks in case of SC, ST, OBC category of Madhya Pradesh in aggregate from any recognized board. For more details, please visit the link: https://aitr.ac.in/courses-procedure/
